select t.id as "id", d.car_id as "carId", t.origin_id as "originId", t.latitude as "latitude", t.longitude as "longitude", t.speed as "speed", t.time as "time", t.device_id as "deviceId" from ( select device_id, MAX(time) as "time" from transform_gps_data where device_id != null or device_id != '' group by device_id ) a LEFT JOIN transform_gps_data t on t.device_id = a.device_id and t.time = a.time left join device d on a.device_id = d.device_id where 1=1
and d.car_id like CONCAT('',#{carId},'%')
